summary: A man who finds there is another world to the one we know.
cast: Lino Ventura|Claudine Auger|Paul Crauchet|Jean Bouise|Nicole Garcia|Roland Bertin|Xavier Depraz|Dominique Lavanant|José Lifante|Jacques Maury|Laura Betti|Jeannine Mestre|Luis González Páramo|Miguel Narros|Conxita Bardem|Alfred Lucchetti|Miguel Muniesa|Carlos Lucena|Juan Torres|Juan Viñallonga|Jarque Zurbano
title: Un papillon sur l'épaule
